items.value:
Hammer
This Hammer is useful for breaking through windows, or destroying some rock guy.
He doesn't even like the sound of this..

Despite him being named like that,
he is still a kid and wants to play RPS with someone..
Where's that person, i just want to play rock paper scissors with them.
Hey, wanna play rock paper scissors?
Aw man! I lost again! I don't even want to talk about my losing streak, ever again.
Oh teacher! Someone is trying to ruin my day again!
Hey teacher! I think someone just stole a binder behind me!
